name: Caduceus: Double snake
description:
Caduceus is a basic snake game where you have two snakes to control at the same time! Pick up food pellets to increase your score and the length of the snakes. The score is both snake lengths multiplied together so make sure that you make both snakes as long as possible to increase your score!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move the selected snake.
  • Space Bar to toggle between the snakes.
  • P to pause the game.

Game, sound track and sound effects were written by Stella Foxxie.

Game made for United Game Jam 2020 with the theme "Two"

Font is dpcomic by codeman38 which is used under the Bitstream Vera Fonts Copyright agreement.
